pages.text: Now this one has some potential, scarily so if I might add. Connect two of these runes together and you can teleport blocks long distances. It even works on all my storage devices! (Not from both ends at once).
Run cost: 100 Tears$(br)$(l:cages/tier_ii)Tier II Soul Cage$(/l)$(br2)Swaps blocks at long distance, but at a steeper price.
